column5: Hi Guys,  ..I know we are not there yet..but..  Any suggestions for hut operators on Simcoe? I am planning a February perching trip for some newbies to ice fishing-kids and adults. I would like some suggestions for a few outfitters that can put us on fish!  Thanks! Skdds
Pretty sure, board member, Steve Rowbotham does ice fishing for perch, as well as lakers/whities.  Good guy, who will do all he can to make your day a success.
